game.name: Trivia Vault: Business Trivia
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Business Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer business trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Business Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer business trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value

reviewHighlights.text: 립낫아, 나도 한계가 있다. 니가 이런식으로 가성비를 짓밟으면은 마, 그땐 안티가 되는 거야! 내가 엄지를 내려 갈기기라도 하랴?
